/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
